name: Jewel Snake
description:
Jewel Snake

The best Snake Game for Android (and Itch.io) :P !

You start as a small snake inside a temple full of jewels.
Collect as much gems as you can and become the biggest snake.
But beware: many dangers (Lava, ghosts, evil snakes, ...) await you there.

How to Play:
Your snake gets longer every time you eat a jewel. You will score more points depending on the lenght of your snake. When colliding with an enemy or obstacle (Vase) you loose points. Become the biggest snake and immortalize you in the online leaderboards!

Controls:

Arrow Keys, Mouse , recommended: Gamepad (you may need an XBox controller or  https://www.x360ce.com/ for gamepad support.  )

Bonus Level:
You can find hidden diamonds in every level.
Collect all diamonds to unlock very hard bonus levels.

Features:
◉ A temple full of secrets
◉ Online Highscore - compete with players from all over the world.
◉ 28 challenging Level
◉ unlock bonus levels
◉ 7 playable snakes

Note: This game was quickly ported from Android to PC. The file size is quite large, the graphics are lowend, and the controls are not optimised for PC atm. I'll be working on this.

The Android game is free (with in-app-purchase to unlock level 16-30), so if you wan't to play before you buy, check it out on the google play store.
